subject: Personal Finance
title: China Invented Paper Money
description: A short lesson to help you apply China Invented Paper Money.

hook.text: In 10th-century China, merchants got tired of carrying heavy iron coins. Paper solved it.

buildup.text: The Song Dynasty introduced 'jiaozi,' the world's first government-issued paper currency.

discovery.text: Paper notes were receipts for coins held in reserve. The paper itself was worthless.

twist.text: But governments printed more notes than they had coins. The first paper inflation soon followed.

climax.text: China invented paper money, experienced its benefits, and suffered its dangers â€” centuries before Europe.

punchline.text: Paper money was born in China.

quiz.question: When and where was paper money first issued by a government?
